title: conferred on them by section 11(1) of the Public Service Management Act 1997
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister 

of State at the Department of the Taoiseach) Order 2020.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister state department taoiseach) order 2020

title: conferred on them by section 11(1) of the Public Service Management Act 1997
heading: 2. Sam Griffin, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
2. Sam Griffin, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of the Taoiseach, is appointed to be a Special Adviser 
to Jack Chambers, Minister of State at the Department of the Taoiseach, with 
effect from 15th July 2020. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

22 December, 2020. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 5th January, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [751] 3 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 
ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR
